readme:
# hubot-wize-menu

A hubot script that retrieves the Wize menu from a Google Spreadsheet.

## Dependencies
+ [node-google-spreadsheet](https://github.com/theoephraim/node-google-spreadsheet)

## Installation

In hubot project repository, run:

```
npm install hubot-wize-menu --save
```

Then add **hubot-wize-menu** to your `external-scripts.json`:

```json
["hubot-wize-menu"]
```

You will need to setup 3 environment variables since the script uses a 2-legged oauth method.

```
GOOGLE_SPREADSHEET_KEY - Google SpreadSheet ID from the URL
GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL - Authenticated Client Email
GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY - Generated Private Key
```

To retrieve the `GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL` and `GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY` keys, follow the instructions of the node-google-spreadsheet README: [Service Account Setup Instructions](https://github.com/theoephraim/node-google-spreadsheet#service-account-recommended-method).

## Sample Interaction

```
user1>> hubot menu lunes
hubot>> Menu del lunes:

​*Desayuno*​
Enfrijoladas

​*Comida*​
1. Pinchos de pollo bañados en mole verde 
V. Brotes con pasas y almendras
A. Moros y Cristianos
```
